document.full_text: the government of the chinese city of shanghai is cutting some fees to defuse striking truck drivers' anger over high fuel prices, an official spokesman said saturday, after days of confrontation earlier this week disrupted the world's busiest port.
document.title: shanghai offers fee cuts to defuse drivers' strike at port
lines_and_colors: the government of the chinese city of shanghai is cutting some fees to defuse striking truck drivers' anger over high fuel prices, an official spokesman said saturday, after days of confrontation earlier this week disrupted the world's busiest port.
